actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules.
Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 93-1487.

official_title: A bill making appropriations for military construction for the Department of Defense for the fiscal year ending June 30, 1975.

summary.text: Waives points of order (relating to consideration of appropriations not previously authorized by law or not germane to the bill) against the bill (H.R. 17468) making appropriations for military construction for the Department of Defense for the fiscal year ending June 30, 1975.

titles.title: A bill making appropriations for military construction for the Department of Defense for the fiscal year ending June 30, 1975.
